high_descs: Turn around then face the desk by the trash can to your right.
Pick up the pen from the floor by the desk in front of you.
Turn around and face the desk with the lamp on your left.
Turn on the lamp on the desk in front of you.
Turn to your left and go to the far left end of the desk.
Pick up the pen on the floor, in front of the desk.
Turn around and walk towards the bed, then turn left at the bed to go to the far right end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp in the right corner of the desk.
turn around, walk to the table
grab the blue pen on the floor
walk to the right a little to the other end of the table
turn on the lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: grab the blue pen on the floor, turn on the lamp on the table
